name: Database Applications

prereqs.text: (15-213 [] at least C) and (15-210 [] at least C)

long_desc: This course covers the fundamental topics for Database Management  Systems Database System Architectural Principles ACID properties data abstraction external, conceptual, and internal schemata data  independence data definition and data manipulation languages, Data  models entityrelationship and relational data models data  structures, integrity constraints, and operations for each data  model relational query languages SQL, algebra, calculus, Theory of  database design functional dependencies normal forms dependency  preservation information loss, Query Optimization equivalence of  expressions, algebraic manipulation optimization of selections and  joins, Storage Strategies indices, Btrees, hashing, Query Processing execution of sort, join, and aggregation operators, and Transaction Processing recovery and concurrency control.
